android.car.drivingstate

类 CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration.DrivingStateRestrictions

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.drivingstate.CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration.DrivingStateRestrictions
  • 封闭类:
    CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration

    public static final class CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration.DrivingStateRestrictions
extends java.lang.Object
    UX restrictions to be applied to a driving state through CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration.Builder.setUxRestrictions(int, CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration.DrivingStateRestrictions). These UX restrictions can also specified to be only applicable to certain speed range and restriction mode.
    另请参阅:
    CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration.Builder.SpeedRange

    • 方法详细资料

      • setDistractionOptimizationRequired

        public CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration.DrivingStateRestrictions setDistractionOptimizationRequired(boolean distractionOptimizationRequired)
        Sets whether Distraction Optimization (DO) is required. Defaults to true.

      • setRestrictions

        public CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration.DrivingStateRestrictions setRestrictions(int restrictions)
        Sets active restrictions. Defaults to CarUxRestrictions.UX_RESTRICTIONS_FULLY_RESTRICTED.

      • setMode

        public CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration.DrivingStateRestrictions setMode(java.lang.String mode)
        Sets restriction mode to apply to. Defaults to CarUxRestrictionsManager.UX_RESTRICTION_MODE_BASELINE.

      • setSpeedRange

        public CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration.DrivingStateRestrictions setSpeedRange(CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration.Builder.SpeedRange speedRange)
        Sets speed range to apply to. Optional value. Not setting one means the restrictions apply to full speed range, namely 0 to CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration.Builder.SpeedRange.MAX_SPEED.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 java.lang.Object
